alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Baca and east central Las Animas Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Kim, or 33 miles west of Springfield, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Baca and east central Las Animas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
